dmca.title: Notice of Abuse and Request to Cease and Desists
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 


________________________________

From: Mark Palmer [mailto:mark@jigsaw.com] 
Sent: Monday, October 09, 2006 5:21 PM
To: abuse
Cc: Andrea Almeida
Subject: Notice of Abuse and Request to Cease and Desists



Dear The Planet.com:

 

Please accept this as notice of abuse by the website that The Planet.com
hosts at jigsawdatacorporation.biz (67.18.160.230).

 

The jigsawdatacorporation.biz domain is owned by Archit Infotech, out of
Mumbai, India, whose actions, in association with those of SMS Media
Pvt. Ltd., are in violation of numerous intellectual property laws,
unfair trade practice regulations and miscellaneous other state and
Federal statutes.  Further, any implication of a relationship between
SMS Media and Jigsaw Data Company is fraudulent and deceitful.   

 

Jigsaw Data Corporation, a Delaware corporation, legitimately owes
operates a data company with an online marketplace at www.jigsaw.com
<http://www.jigsaw.com/> .   In order to prevent a continuing fraud and
to avoid other unnecessary damages, we respectfully request the
following:

 

1.       That The Planet immediately cease hosting
jigsawdatacorporation.biz pending your investigation;

2.       That The Planet collect and retain any and all information,
records and evidence in its possession custody or control with respect
to the hosting of jigsawdatacorporation.biz at 67.18.160.230.

3.       That The Planet (i) immediately state its policy and procedures
under which Jigsaw may request the information listed in (2.) above, and
(ii) if The Planet requires a subpoena or other court order for such
information, provide a timely response indicating the proper agent and
address for service of process and whether The Planet is will accept
service of our legal complaint as necessary to obtain such an order.

 

Please advise me of you intentions with respect to this matter at you
earliest convenience.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Thank you in
advance for your cooperation.

 

Mark S. Palmer

Corporate Counsel and Director of Privacy

Jigsaw Data Corporation

1700 S. Amphlett Blvd., Suite 250

San Mateo, CA 94402

mark@jigsaw.com

Tel: 650.655.2267

Fax: 650.655.2222

www.jigsaw.com <http://www.jigsaw.com/>
